snippet: There is a way to “hide” items from your list so they aren’t visible on a shared computer. Also, how to enlarge the New Message window in Gmail.
abstract: Personal Tech Q&A on removing items from Purchased list on iTunes Store; altering settings in Gmail; Tip of the Week on free MSN Food & Drink app.
lead_paragraph: There is a way to “hide” items from your list so they aren’t visible on a shared computer. Also, how to enlarge the New Message window in Gmail.

headline.print_headline: How to Hide Past iTunes Purchases
headline.main: How to Hide Past iTunes Purchases
